page.title: 09HOUSING IN BALMEDIE
page.content: In Balmedie 1985there are 49 semi-detatched houses.There are 44 detatched houses and 28 cottages plus 114 terraced houses.There are lots of houses planned in Balmedie over the next few years.This means that there will be a lot more people in Balmedie.There will also be a lot more shops.The houses in Balmedie are made with cement blocks,and finished off with roughcast which makes them look nice.Most houses in Balmedie have 6 rooms in them.The bathroom, kitchen,2 bedrooms,living room and a box room.There is a big room in the roof called the attic where you can put stuff that you dont need.There are different forms of heating some people have solid fuel heating,some have gas, and some people use electricity to heat their homes.
